content: add a handmade touch to your holiday décor with this snowflake christmas ornament crochet pattern designed to work up quickly and easily this festive crochet ornament features a delicate snowflake shape decorative beads at the top and a playful tassel hanging from the bottom it s the perfect small project for decorating your tree gifting to friends or adding to holiday craft fairs made with worsted weight yarn and a size h 5 0 mm crochet hook this ornament is beginner-friendly while still offering beautiful texture and detail
